section.title: Downloading
section.para: The standalone jetty distribution is available for download from the Eclipse Foundation.

It is available in both zip and gzip formats, download the one most appropriate for your system. You may note that there are a number of other files with extensions of .sha, or .md5 which are checksum files. When you download and unpack the binary, it is extracted into a directory called jetty-distribution-VERSION. Put this directory into a convenient location. The rest of the instructions in this wiki will refer to this location as either JETTY_HOME or as $(jetty.home).

section.title: Distribution Content
section.para: This is a quick rundown of the distribution's contents. The top-level directory contains:

row.entry: utility shell scripts to help run Jetty on unix systems
contains all the JAR files necessary to run jetty
directory containing additional resources for classpath, activated via configuration
jar which invokes jetty (see also How to Run Jetty)
directory containing webapps which will be run under the default configuration of Jetty; contains demo webapps
